makefile
# Configuration de base
PORT=3000
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=27017

# Authentification JWT

# Upload de fichiers

MAX_FILE_SIZE=10MB
ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS=png,jpg,jpeg,gif
